topic: How to define glass as the real situation?
body:
Hi, all,


I'm simulating daylighting problem.


How to define glass as the real situation? I mean the trasmittance,
absorption, reflection are all under consideration. or what material should I
read?


it's perfect if have some example lines.


Thank you for your help.


ZZ
